'''Temporary battles''' refers to special battles in Pokéclicker where the player faces a trainer or Pokémon once to unlock other areas. Once the player wins, these battles become inaccessible. ==Kanto== ===Regular Battles=== *Note: Minimum attack is calculated without taking into consideration click attack or the Pokémon's type(s). You can see how much damage you do against a certain Pokémon by clicking on or scrolling over the "Pokémon attack" number below the battle screen.
